JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Helt Rent i Køge is looking for full-time cleaning assistants for cleaning in private homes as well as a few companies, working 30-37 hours per week.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Helt Rent i Køge is looking for full-time cleaning assistants for cleaning in private homes as well as a few companies, working 30-37 hours per week.

It is required that you have a category B driver’s license and can speak and understand Danish.

We expect you to be:
• Reliable and flexible
• Independent and responsible
• Approachable

Non-negotiable requirements:
• A criminal record must be provided.

Flexible requirements:
• It is not required to have prior cleaning experience, but it is essential that you are dedicated to delivering high-quality work. Attention to small details and effort in every task are a must. We do not compromise on cleanliness, so you must see yourself as part of this commitment.

We operate across the entire island of Zealand.

Working hours are from 7 AM to 3 PM, as well as every other Saturday.

We offer:
• Flexible working hours
• Independence and freedom with responsibility
• Thorough training
• A dynamic and varied work environment

If you meet all our expectations, we start with a salary of DKK 150 per hour.

Would you like to join Denmark’s best cleaning team? Send your application and CV to Katja.rossi@hotmail.com or, if you have questions, call +45 28952705.
